alert.note: Alert for Aroostook (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 12 at 8:28PM EDT until July 12 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Caribou
info.description: The National Weather Service in Caribou Maine has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Aroostook County in northern Maine... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 828 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Loring, or 8 miles north of Limestone, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Caribou, Limestone, Loring, Connor, Caswell, Stockholm, Hamlin and Cyr Plantation. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
